fig.attrib: Source: Adapted from Iglesias, N.G., Byk, L.A., Gamarnik, A.V., 2013. Molecular virology of dengue virus. In: Ooi, A.P.E.E., Gubler, D.J., Vasudevan, S., Farrar, J. (Eds.), Dengue and Dengue Hemorrhagic Fever. CAB International. pp. 334–365 ( Iglesias et al., 2013).
